titleStmt.title: The priests patent cancelled, or the lay-mans answer, to the priests objections. Wherein the pretended grounds of the Ministery for the upholding of their arbitrary practises, over the consciences and estates of the people are answered, and refuted, by undeniable arguments from scripture and reason. / By William Hartley.
titleStmt.author: Hartley, William, of Stony-Stratford.

titleStmt.title: The priests patent cancelled, or the lay-mans answer, to the priests objections. Wherein the pretended grounds of the Ministery for the upholding of their arbitrary practises, over the consciences and estates of the people are answered, and refuted, by undeniable arguments from scripture and reason. / By William Hartley.
titleStmt.author: Hartley, William, of Stony-Stratford.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dawson for Henry Cripps and are to be sold in Popes-head Alley,
